text.english: Whoever offers praise glorifies Me; And to him who orders his conduct aright I will show the salvation of God." Offer to God thanksgiving, And pay your vows to the Most High.
text.arabic: ذَابِحُ الْحَمْدِ يُمَجِّدُنِي وَالْمُقَوِّمُ طَرِيقَهُ أُرِيهِ خَلاَصَ اللهِ]. اِذْبَحْ لِلَّهِ حَمْداً وَأَوْفِ الْعَلِيَّ نُذُورَكَ
